mapper.insert: insert into board_table(boardTitle, boardWriter, boardPassword, boardContents) values(#{boardTitle}, #{boardWriter}, #{boardPassword}, #{boardContents})
mapper.select: select id, boardTitle, boardWriter, boardContents, boardHits, boardCreatedDate from board_table where id=#{id}
mapper.update: update board_table set boardHits = boardHits+1 where id = #{id}
